steps.conclusion: None. The suggestions follow the rules: Portuguese output, relevant canonical courses for a vague input, proper single-topic titles without joiners, <=5 words, no level terms, no law or language-learning edge cases triggered, icons use tabler- prefix, is_language_course=false for all.

The english_title for the suggestion titled "Python" is "Python Programming"; the most appropriate English translation of the title "Python" is simply "Python". This is a small mismatch with the requirement that english_title be the most appropriate translation (and for English suggestions, use the same title).

- Change the english_title for "Python" from "Python Programming" to "Python" to exactly match the title translation.
